sentences.english: Last Saturday, something amazing happened!
sentences.chinese: 上周六，发生了一件神奇的事！

sentences.english: Our school decided to have a music festival.
sentences.chinese: 我们学校决定举办一个音乐节。

sentences.english: Different bands came to play.
sentences.chinese: 不同的乐队来表演。

sentences.english: The electric guitar sound was suddenly loud and exciting.
sentences.chinese: 电吉他的声音突然变得很大，很激动人心。

sentences.english: Everybody smiled and enjoyed the music.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都微笑着，享受着音乐。

sentences.english: My friend Tom plays in a rock band.
sentences.chinese: 我的朋友汤姆在一个摇滚乐队演奏。

sentences.english: He practices the guitar every day.
sentences.chinese: 他每天练习吉他。

sentences.english: On the day of the festival, he was nervous before going on stage.
sentences.chinese: 在音乐节那天，上台前他很紧张。

sentences.english: "I hope people enjoy our music," he said.
sentences.chinese: "我希望人们喜欢我们的音乐,"他说。

sentences.english: The crowd nodded and clapped their hands.
sentences.chinese: 观众点头鼓掌。

sentences.english: After the show, we rushed to the sports field.
sentences.chinese: 演出结束后，我们冲向运动场。

sentences.english: Some students like to skate, while others enjoy volleyball or club activities.
sentences.chinese: 有些学生喜欢滑冰，有些则喜欢排球或俱乐部活动。

sentences.english: I saw my classmate Mary there.
sentences.chinese: 我在那里看到了我的同学玛丽。

sentences.english: She usually feels lonely, but today she was happy.
sentences.chinese: 她平时感觉很孤独，但今天她很开心。

sentences.english: She made new friends at the festival.
sentences.chinese: 她在音乐节上交了新朋友。

sentences.english: Later, we watched traditional paper-cutting.
sentences.chinese: 后来，我们观看了传统剪纸。

sentences.english: It is an old Chinese art.
sentences.chinese: 这是中国的一种古老艺术。

sentences.english: The artist held her scissors and cut beautiful shapes on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 艺术家拿着剪刀，在地上剪出了漂亮的形状。

sentences.english: Her hands moved across the paper, but she was not weak at all.
sentences.chinese: 她的手在纸上移动，但她一点也不虚弱。

sentences.english: She created flowers, birds, and people.
sentences.chinese: 她创造了花、鸟和人。

sentences.english: At midnight, we sat around a fire.
sentences.chinese: 午夜时分，我们围坐在火堆旁。

sentences.english: We shared stories from our notebooks.
sentences.chinese: 我们分享笔记本里的故事。

sentences.english: Tom read a page from his diary about a magic adventure.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆读了日记里的一页，是关于一次魔法冒险的。

sentences.english: We laughed at his jokes.
sentences.chinese: 我们被他的笑话逗乐了。

sentences.english: "Do you feel joy when you play music?" I asked Tom.
sentences.chinese: "你演奏音乐时会感到快乐吗？"我问汤姆。

sentences.english: "Yes," he said.
sentences.chinese: "是的,"他说。

sentences.english: "Music brings people together.
sentences.chinese: "音乐把人们聚在一起。

sentences.english: It's the key to happiness."
sentences.chinese: 这是快乐的关键。"

sentences.english: We stayed awake almost until dawn.
sentences.chinese: 我们一直醒着，直到黎明。

sentences.english: The nature around us was peaceful.
sentences.chinese: 周围的大自然很宁静。

sentences.english: No one wanted to leave.
sentences.chinese: 没有人想离开。

sentences.english: This festival was a wonderful adventure for everybody.
sentences.chinese: 这个音乐节对每个人来说都是一次精彩的冒险。
